abilities.name: Advanced Flying
abilities.description:
This unit can fly. It now can exist on three different battlefield planes. The ground, and the air level 1, and air level 2, and air level 3. It costs 1 hex of movement to move upward but not downward.

Additionally, you are immune to environmental effects.

abilities.name: Aerial Combat
abilities.description: Gains __+1__ on attacks made against flying units.

abilities.name: Aerial Evasion
abilities.description: Gains **+1** to _AC_ while in the air.

abilities.name: Alert
abilities.description: This unit always musters and can muster **1** adjacent unit (during movement).

abilities.name: Alter Emotions
abilities.description:
Increase or decrease the `organization` (HP) of any `non-elite` group of soldiers by __%amt%__. {sooth-amt} Non-elites can instead gain __%amt%+%sooth-amt%__ `hp`.{/sooth-amt}  {riot} Non-elites now lose __%amt%+%riot-amt%__ `hp`. {/riot}
{spread-ae} Units with an adjacency of __%spread-ae%__ to the target are also affected in the same way {/spread-ae}

abilities.name: Aquatic Attack
abilities.description: Add **+1** to any attack made from the _water_.

abilities.name: Attack from the Deeps
abilities.description: Gain **+2** damage on attacks made against other targets in the water that are at ground level.

abilities.name: Attentive
abilities.description: This unit always musters

abilities.name: Basic Attack
abilities.description: You make **1** melee attack against an adjacent enemy. Roll __1d6{dmg}+%dmg%{/dmg}__ and do that much damage.

abilities.name: Beguile
Bless
abilities.description: Buff up **%bless_tars%** ally(s) within range, granting them **+1** on their first attack/cantrip strike of their turn.

abilities.name: Cantrip Strike
abilities.description:
Deal **1d6+%can_dmg%** damage to an enemy.

{can_pierce} This attack always does %can_dmg% {/can_pierce}

abilities.name: Charge
Dash
abilities.description: Move %movement% hexes.

abilities.name: Dash Expert
abilities.description: Once per turn, you can replace any one of your attacks with movement up to your speed.

abilities.name: Death Bomb
abilities.description: This unit can dive bomb and forcefully smash itself into enemy units. This kills this unit. It does 2 damage to a target's HP.

abilities.name: Death Ward
abilities.description: Place a ward against death on a unit. If that unit is reduced to 0 HP it instead goes to %hp% HP. When this happens the spell is used up and you lose concentration on it.

abilities.name: Defend
abilities.description:
Gain    **%armor%** _armor_ until the start of your next turn.


{brace}For this turn, gain the following effects:

1. You are Immune to Charge effects.
2. Enemies that move adjacent to you take 1 damage.
{/brace}

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.description:
Block %deflect% ranged attack that is made at you. Declare before the attack is rolled. 

For magic attacks, deflect on a roll of %lowerRange% or higher.

abilities.name: Dive Bomb
abilities.description: When this unit moves from a higher elevation to a lower elevation it gains +1 damage for each air level it decends through for its next attack.

abilities.name: Diving
abilities.description: This unit can swim under water. Gain access to a -1 vertical space in water. Gain +3 to AC from units that are ground or above. You get a -2 dice roll on all attacks on units that are at ground or above.

abilities.name: Dominate
abilities.description: {base} Take control of `non-elite` units (so common soliders and such). The unit is under your control until the battle ends or it loses half its current health. Can only have __%units%__ unit(s) dominated at a time. {/base} {elite} Take control of any unit. The unit is under your control until the battle ends or it loses half its current health. Can only have __%unit%__ unit(s) dominated at a time.{/elite}

abilities.name: Extra Versatile
abilities.description: You can choose to take actions before or after each unit of movement.

abilities.name: Ferry
abilities.description: This unit can carry other units on water. It takes 1 action to load an ally (action used during movement). No action required to disembark.

abilities.name: Flying
abilities.description:
This unit can fly. It now can exist on two different battlefield planes. The ground, and the air level 1. It costs 1 hex of movement to move upward but not downward.

Additionally, you are immune to environmental effects.

abilities.name: Greater Knitting
abilities.description: Restore %hp% HP to all adjacent undead units

abilities.name: Guardian
abilities.description: As a reaction, can intercept %attacks% attack(s) going towards an adjacent ally. You now take that attack - also take 1 damage.

abilities.name: Guiding Bolt
abilities.description: You hit an enemy with a blast of light, dealing %dmg% nonabsorbable damage. Next round, allies have +%roll% on all attacks/cantrip strikes against this target.

abilities.name: Knit Flesh
abilities.description: Restore %hp% HP to an adjacent undead unit

abilities.name: Mass Knitting
abilities.description: Restore %hp% HP to all undead units within 2 hexes (100m area)

abilities.name: Multi Attack
Reactive Armor
abilities.description: When an enemy attacks you, gain 1 AC. Lose 1 AC at the start of each turn.

abilities.name: Restoration
abilities.description:
Heal a unit %hp%+%@holyheal% HP within spell range.{divine}

Restoration can now be cast for 2 spell slots and heals 10 HP if done this way.{/divine}

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description:
When an attack hits (does damage to HP), you may spend 1 spell slot to make that attack do +%dmg%
      damage

abilities.name: Spellcasting
abilities.description:
You can now cast _spells_ and _cantrips_. Casting a spell requires **1** spell slot of the corresponding school of magic.

_Range: **%range%**_
_Contentration Bonus: **%concentration%**_

abilities.name: Spirit Guardians
abilities.description: Call upon spiritual guardians to protect you. You gain %ac% AC and adjacent enemies take %dmg% unabsorbable damage at the start of your turn. {armor_debuff} Enemies within the zone also have their armor reduced by %armor_debuff% {/armor_debuff}

abilities.name: Strafing Run
abilities.description: As part of movement can make a breath attack against up to %targets% target(s) (adjacent to each) that you fly over in a straight line. This costs 1 breath attack use and does half breath damage (but full effect). Costs 1 movement to initiate for each targeted hex.

abilities.name: Submarine Transportation
abilities.description: This unit can carry other units on water and underwater. It takes 1 action to load an ally (action used during movement). No action required to disembark.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Swarm around an adjacent enemy unit, co-existing in their hex, and blocking ranged attacks against targets other than itself. This unit can now move 3 hexes as a reaction to stay with its swarmed unit, any more movement breaks the swarm. In addition it can choose to be hit by ranged attacks that would pass through its hex.

abilities.name: Swimming
abilities.description: If this unit can move up to %movement% hexes in the water. If the unit's speed is less than %movement% it can move up to its speed.

abilities.name: Turn Undead
abilities.description: Force undead on their turn to move at least %range% hex away from you and get no closer for %rounds% round.

abilities.name: Versatile
abilities.description: You can choose to take actions prior to movement.

abilities.name: Command
abilities.description: Gain a command aura of %commandRadius% m radius (every adjacent hex)

abilities.name: Rally
Aggressive Commander
abilities.description: Allied units adjacent to this unit can make 1 extra attack, unmodified.

abilities.name: Energetic Commander
abilities.description: Allied units in this units command aura can move 1 extra hex.

abilities.name: Rally+
abilities.description:
As an action, allied units in your command aura regain %hp% HP.

2 units within your command aura can make 1 attack 
OR
1 unit within your command aura can make 2 attacks

abilities.name: Attack of Opportunity
abilities.description: This unit can make a single melee attack (with modified damage) against any enemy that moves out of adjacency with it. The attack takes place immediately.

abilities.name: Professionals
abilities.description: This unit is always active (doesnt count to active unit count).

abilities.name: Raise Dead
abilities.description: {base}Raise a deceased unit as a zombie horde with %raiseHp%% health.{/base}{num}Raise 2 deceased unit as a zombie horde with %raiseHp%% health.{/num}

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.description:
Create a link between you and a target within range. Each turn as a bonus action you can tap that link (including turn 1) . Tapping the link deals %dmg% damage to the target's HP and gives that HP to you. 

 This spell lasts as long as the target remains within 6 hexes of the caster.

abilities.name: Wither
abilities.description:
curse a target within range with:
   
-%arm% armor
   -%atk% attack 
   -%mve% movement

Lasts 2 turns. This spell lasts as long as the target remains within 6 hexes of the caster.

abilities.name: Unrelenting Horde
abilities.description: If this unit kills an adjacent unit. It spawns a new zombie unit from the dead unit. The new zombie has %hpPercent%% health

abilities.name: Necromancy
abilities.description:
You can cast Necromancy spells.

Spell Slots: %slots%
Spells Per action: %spellsPerAction%

abilities.name: Holy Casting
abilities.description:
You can cast holy spells.

_Spell Slots: **%slots%**_
_Spells Per action: **%spells%**_

abilities.name: Melee Attack
Ranged Attack
Tie Down
abilities.description: The unit can spend an attack to tie down an adjacent enemy, restricting their movement by %spd_down% hexes.

abilities.name: Seige Attack
abilities.description:
This unit can attack walls/towers and gains a bonus to attack gates.

Do %seige_atk% more damage against all buildings.

abilities.name: Massive
abilities.description: This unit can attack airborne target or targets on walls with no penalty.

abilities.name: Hurl
abilities.description: This unit can now throw entities from adjacent units at targets within %hurl_range% hexes. This attack does %hurl_dmg% of which 1 is piercing.

abilities.name: Critical Strike
abilities.description:
{base}When you roll a 1 on an attack you may reroll that die once and add the 1 to the result.{/base}
{explode} Explode on 1s.{/explode}

abilities.name: Evocation Casting
abilities.description:
You can cast `evocation` spells.

_Spell Slots: **%evo_slots%**_
_Spells Per action: **%evo_spells%**_

abilities.name: Magical Barrage
Shield
abilities.description: As a reaction, cast shield on an ally that is within your spell casting range. They gain %shield_armor% armor against the %shield_count% attack. {shield_dmg} If an attack fails to do damage, the absorbed damage is done to the attacker's hp pool. {/shield_dmg}

abilities.name: Abjuration Casting
abilities.description:
You can cast abjuration spells.

_Spell Slots: **%abju_slots%**_
_Spells Per action: **%abju_spells%**_

abilities.name: Armor of Agathys
abilities.description: As an action, cast Armor of Agathys on an ally (or self). That entity gains %temp_hp% temp HP and when hit by another creature (and still has at least 1 temp HP) it does damge to the attacker equal to the current (pre-hit) temp hp. {Aga_effect} Enemies that take damage by this effect gain the frostbite effect (lose 1 movement) {/aga_effect}

abilities.name: Mage Armor
abilities.description: As an action, cast Mage armor on self. Gains %m_armor% armor for %m-armor-turns% turns.

abilities.name: Magical Deflection
abilities.description:
As a reaction in response to projectiles or spells targeting you. You create a magical shield that deflects projectiles.  This causes %mdef_count% ranged attack(s) made against you to miss.
{redirect} Any deflected attack can be redirected, use the original attack's stats {/redirect}

abilities.name: Divination Casting
abilities.description:
You can cast `divination` spells.

_Spell Slots: **%div_slots%**_
_Spells Per action: **%div_spells%**_

abilities.name: Gift of Foresight
abilities.description: Choose __%gof_num%__ ally within spell range and grant them __%gof_ac%__ `AC`. {gof_atk} Also give them __+1__ on their dice rolls. {/gof_atk} {gof_react} A unit with the `Gift of Forsight` on them can, as a _reaction_ to another unit becoming adjacent, move __%gof_react%__ hex(es) away. They can only do this once. This movement would never provoke an _attack of oppourtunity_. {/gof_react}

abilities.name: Portent
abilities.description: Before a battle, roll __%Port_num%x1d6__ and save that roll. You can replace any attack roll within spell range by yourself, an ally, or enemy with this number. Uses a _reaction_ if used to replace an enemy roll. Within magical range.

abilities.name: Phantom Sight
abilities.description: Choose __%ps-num%__  enemy unit(s). {base1}The DM will tell you what _action_ they will use on their next turn. {/base1} {ps-adv} The DM will tell you what _movement_ and _action_ they will use on their next turn. {/ps-adv} {base2} Only effective on `non-command` units {/base2} {ps-comm} Effective on `all` unit types. {/ps-comm}

abilities.name: Enchantment Casting
abilities.description:
You can cast `enchantment` spells.

_Spell slots: **%enc-slots%**_
_Spells per action: **%enc-spells%**_

abilities.name: Portal
Entangling Ground
abilities.description: As an action, you can choose %eg-hex% hexes of ground and {base} make it difficult terrain.{/base}  {eg-imm} impassible terrain, units can move it it but to move out requires them to spend %eg-imm% actions to free themselves.{/eg-imm}. {eg-dmg}Units that end their turn within this area take %eg-dmg%.{/eg-dmg}Hex must be within casting range.{eg-cree}Now requires concentration. Entangling ground grows by %eg-cree% hex(s) per turn.{/eg-cree}

abilities.name: Storm
abilities.description: As an action, you unleash a magical storm. This storm occupies %storm-size% hex and travels %storm-mve% hex per turn around the map.{sto-high}The storm hits %sto-high% hex(s) above the ground hex. {/sto-high} It moves after your team's action phase is over. It moves again at the end of the other team's action phase. {sto-base} For each movement, roll 1d6, it moves to that adjacent hex. {/sto-base} {sto-ride} You can now control the storm. The storm moves %storm-mve% hex(s). The storm now moves during your movement phase. {/sto-ride}The storm does %storm-dmg% nonabsorbable damage to any unit it passes over / that moves through it. It only does 1 damage to units at the start of their turn. {sto-mas} You gain %sto-mas% armor while in the storm, and your regular attacks do +%sto-mas% damage. {/sto-mas} {sto-wall}The storm now cannot be moved through, and any unit that starts their turn in the storm cannot move this turn. {/sto-wall}

abilities.name: Conjure Entites
Conjuration Casting
abilities.description:
You can now cast conjuration spells. 
You can cast %con-num% spells per day.

abilities.name: Dragon Breath
Breath Attacks
Draconic Bombardment
abilities.description: {base}You can now target a  hex with your breath weapon attack.{/base}{area}You can now target a line-area of 2 hexes with your breath weapon attack.{/area} Deal %bw2-dmg% damage (absorbable) to that hex or a unit on that hex.{bw-block}The hex targeted by your draconic attack becomes impassible. It can however be destroyed. It has %bw-block% hp. If used on a unit, the blocker is still created, and the unit can use half its movement to move out of it.{/bw-block}{bw-quag}The hex targeted by your draconic attack becomes difficult terrain, units can enter the hex as normal but leaving the hex costs %bw-quag-str% movement to exit from. It lasts for %bw-quag% turns.{/bw-quag}{bw-pierce} Breath weapon attacks always do at least 1 damage to hp.{/bw-pierce}

abilities.name: Undead
abilities.description: You are an undead unit! You can only heal via necromancy spells.

abilities.name: Heal
abilities.description: You regain %heal% hp. {fri-heal} You can heal adjacent units instead. {/fri-heal}

abilities.name: Recovery
abilities.description: You can regain %recov% hp in a single day. Magical healing can override this limitation.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.description: Gain %regen% _hp_ at the start of your turn. No maximum healing.

abilities.name: Bone Realocation
abilities.description: Heal for %br-heal% _hp_ but lose 3 speed 1 attack for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Harpoon
abilities.description: Any attack that hits and would deal damage can be turned into a harpoon attack instead. The attack now deals no damage but tethers the attacked unit to this one. The attacked unit cannot move farther away then it currently is. The harpooned unit can use %harp% action(s) to dispel the tether.

abilities.name: Bone Growth
abilities.description: Gain %bne-gro% hp if on top of a deceased skeletal unit.

abilities.name: Cursed Strikes
abilities.description: Attacks now only damage a unit's maximum health.

abilities.name: Vampiric Strikes
abilities.description: Attacks that do damage to an enemy unit heal you for %vs-heal% hp per hit. {base} Regeneration limited by **Recovery** limit. {/base}{adv} No limit.{/adv}

abilities.name: Hamstringing Stirkes
abilities.description: Each attack that does damage reduces targets movement next turn by %ham% hex(es).

abilities.name: Rampaging Strike
abilities.description: Can move 1 hex after each strike.

abilities.name: Infecting Strikes
abilities.description: Units killed by you rise again as undead loyal to you.

abilities.name: Flaming Strikes
abilities.description: {base} Units that you deal damage to via attacks are set on fire. They take %dmg% hp damage at the start of their turn.{/base}{adv}Units that you attack are set on fire. They take %dmg% hp damage at the start of their turn.{/adv}

nodes.name: Basic
nodes.description: Congrats! You are a unit.

nodes.name: Spellcasting
nodes.description: Grants your unit the ability to cast spells

nodes.name: Speed
nodes.description: Allows you to move one additional hex per turn

nodes.name: Versatile
nodes.description: Grants the Versatile ability

nodes.name: Extra Versatile
nodes.description: Grants the Extra Versatile ability

nodes.name: Dash
nodes.description: Grants the Dash ability

nodes.name: Dash+
nodes.description: Increases the movement of Dash by 2

nodes.name: Dash Expert
nodes.description: Grants the Dash Expert ability

nodes.name: Charge
nodes.description: Grants the Charge ability

nodes.name: Breakthrough
nodes.description: Grants you the ability to continue moving through units after a charge.

nodes.name: Charge+
nodes.description: Increases the movement of Charge by 2

nodes.name: Flying
nodes.description: Grants you the ability to fly

nodes.name: Death Bomb
nodes.description: Grants you the Death Bomb ability. Must be undead to use.

nodes.name: Swarm
nodes.description: Grants you the Swarm ability.

nodes.name: Strafing Run
nodes.description: Grants you the Strafing Run ability.

nodes.name: Strafing Run+
nodes.description: Increases the number of targets by 3.

nodes.name: Advanced Flying
nodes.description: Increases the number of targets by 3.

nodes.name: Dive Bomb
nodes.description: Grants you the Dive Bomb ability.

nodes.name: Aerial Combat
nodes.description: Grants you the Aerial Combat ability.

nodes.name: Aerial Evasion
nodes.description: Grants you the Aerial Evasion ability.

nodes.name: Armor
nodes.description: Adds 1 Armor

nodes.name: Attentive
nodes.description: Grants the Attentive ability

nodes.name: Alert
nodes.description: Grants the Alert ability

nodes.name: Reactive Armor
nodes.description: Sets your AC to 1 and grants Reactive Armor.

nodes.name: Reactive Armor 2
nodes.description: Increases your base AC to 2

nodes.name: Defend 1
nodes.description: Grants the ability to defend, temporarily increasing your armor.

nodes.name: Deflection
nodes.description: Grants the Deflect ability.

nodes.name: Magical deflection
nodes.description: Makes it easier to deflect magic attacks.

nodes.name: Guardian
nodes.description: Grants the Guardian ability

nodes.name: Spell Range
nodes.description: Increases the range of your magic.

nodes.name: Concentration+
nodes.description: Add +1 to concentration checks.

nodes.name: Holy-Divine Casting
nodes.description: Grants you the ability to cast Holy/Divine Spells.

nodes.name: Holy Power
nodes.description: Increases the damage of Smite and Guiding Bolt by 1

nodes.name: Advanced Guiding Bolt
nodes.description: Guiding bolt now gives allies +2 to hit the target next round.

nodes.name: Swimming
nodes.description: Congrats! You can swim!

nodes.name: Advanded Swimming
nodes.description: Your swim speed is faster.

nodes.name: Ferry
nodes.description: Grants the Ferry ability

nodes.name: Diving
nodes.description: Grants the Diving ability

nodes.name: Submarine Transportation
nodes.description: Grants the Submarine Transportation ability

nodes.name: Attack From The Deep
nodes.description: Grants the Attack From The Deep ability

nodes.name: Compelling Beguile
nodes.description: Beguiled opponents can now be Compelled and Charmed.

nodes.name: Weakining beguile
nodes.description: Charmed opponents make 1 fewer attack against you.

nodes.name: Manipulator
nodes.description: You are better at altering emotions and beguiling.

nodes.name: Brace
nodes.description: Brace for attacks while defending, negating charge effects and damaging nearby enemies.

nodes.name: Professionals
nodes.description: Grants the "Professionals" ability.

nodes.name: Necromancy
nodes.description: Cast Necromancer spells.

nodes.name: Raise Dead+
nodes.description: Increases the health of raised units.

nodes.name: Raise Dead++
nodes.description: Raise units to full health.

nodes.name: Necromantic Profiency
nodes.description: Increases the number of necromancy spells you can cast

nodes.name: Necromantic Mastery
nodes.description: Further increases the number of spells you can cast

nodes.name: Life Giver
nodes.description: Stronger minion management.

nodes.name: Greater Restoration
nodes.description:
Restoration now heals 5 HP.

Death Ward restores units to 3 HP.

nodes.name: Divine Restoration
nodes.description: Restoration can now be cast for 2 spell slots and heals 10 HP if done this way.

nodes.name: Cleric
nodes.description: Holy spells heal for 1 additional HP.

nodes.name: Paladin
nodes.description: Holy spells deal +1 damage

nodes.name: Piercing Strikes
nodes.description: Attacks always do some damage.

nodes.name: Piercing Arrowheads
nodes.description: Ranged attacks pierce armor.

nodes.name: Massive
nodes.description: This unit has learned how to project its enormity across the battlefield.

nodes.name: Evocation
nodes.description: Grants you the ability to cast Evocation spells.

nodes.name: Concussive Barrage
nodes.description: When you cast Magical Barrage you can choose to instead deal no damage but cause the enemy to be unable to move on their next turn.

nodes.name: Barrage Effect
nodes.description: When you cast the Magical Barrage Spell you can add an effect on the target.

nodes.name: Enhanced Barrage
nodes.description: Magical barrage now does more damage.

nodes.name: Evocation Proficiency
nodes.description: You can cast more evocation spells

nodes.name: Lasting magics
nodes.description: Trade damage now for damage later.

nodes.name: Enhanced Cantrip Strike
nodes.description: Increases the potency of Cantrip Strike.

nodes.name: Piercing Cantrip Strike
nodes.description: Cantrip strike now does piercing damage.

nodes.name: Abjuration
nodes.description: You can now cast abjuration spells.

nodes.name: Abjuration Proficiency
nodes.description: You can cast more abjuration spells.

nodes.name: Magical Shielding
nodes.description: Shield and magical deflection are upgraded.

nodes.name: Magical redirection
nodes.description: Ranged returned to sender.

nodes.name: Volitile Shield
nodes.description: Attacks fully absorbed by shield (reg. armor + shield armor) hurt the attacker.

nodes.name: Magical Armor
nodes.description: Upgrade your magical armor.

nodes.name: Lasting Armor
nodes.description: Mage armor lasts longer

nodes.name: Subzero Armor
nodes.description: Armor of agathys is more effective.

nodes.name: Reactive Abjurer
nodes.description: Makes shield and magical deflection at the cost of mage armor and armor of agathys.

nodes.name: Prepared Abjurer
nodes.description: Improve Mage armor and armor of agathys at the cost of reactive shielding.

nodes.name: Divination Proficiency
nodes.description: You can cast more divination spells.

nodes.name: Gift of Foresight
nodes.description: Improved gift of foresight.

nodes.name: Advantage of Foresight
nodes.description: Gift of foresight now grains bonuses to attacking.

nodes.name: Gift of reaction
nodes.description: Gift of foresight now allows a unit to move away from an enemy.

nodes.name: Deep Portent
nodes.description: Reroll more dice from portent.

nodes.name: Spectre Sight
nodes.description: Improved Phantom sight.

nodes.name: Command Sight
nodes.description: Improved phantom sight for command units.

nodes.name: Precognitist
nodes.description: Improves gift of foresight and phantom sight at the cost of portent.

nodes.name: Tea reader
nodes.description: Greatly improves portent at the cost of gift of foresight and spectre sight.

nodes.name: Enchantment Proficiency
nodes.description: You can cast more enchantment spells.

nodes.name: Soother
nodes.description: Alter emotions increase a units hp significantly.

nodes.name: Rioter
nodes.description: Alter emotions does more damage.

nodes.name: Mass manipulation
nodes.description: Alter emotions now spreads through the ranks.

nodes.name: Mass beguiling
nodes.description: Beguile now hits more targets.

nodes.name: Controlling
nodes.description: You can dominate more units

nodes.name: Dominant
nodes.description: You can control elite units.

nodes.name: Master Manipulator
nodes.description: You are even better at manipulation.

nodes.name: Iron will
nodes.description: Greatly increases domination.

nodes.name: Conjuration
nodes.description: You can now cast conjuration spells.

nodes.name: Conjuration Proficiency
nodes.description: Cast more conjuration spells

nodes.name: Rapid Response Unit
nodes.description: You prepare units to aid you in battle.

nodes.name: Large Portal
nodes.description: More stable portals.

nodes.name: Gateway
nodes.description: A stable rift between two locations.

nodes.name: Tempest
nodes.description: A more devastating storm.

nodes.name: Storm Rider
nodes.description: Move with the storm.

nodes.name: Superstorm
nodes.description: Larger storm.

nodes.name: Cloudburst
nodes.description: Storm moves faster.

nodes.name: Storm King
nodes.description: You are the master of storms.

nodes.name: Summoner
nodes.description: You can summon stronger entities.

nodes.name: Mass summoning
nodes.description: You summon more entities.

nodes.name: Storm wall
nodes.description: Units get trapped within the storm.

nodes.name: Highstorm
nodes.description: Storm goes up.

nodes.name: Hurricane
nodes.description: Storm does more damage.

nodes.name: Hellgate
nodes.description: Open a stable portal to somewhere aweful.

nodes.name: Divine Portal
nodes.description: Call in powerful allies.

nodes.name: Devouring Portal
nodes.description: Portal pulls low mass units into it.

nodes.name: Massive Entanglement
nodes.description: Entangle a larger area.

nodes.name: Immobilizing Entanglement
nodes.description: Entanglement traps units.

nodes.name: Dragon Breath
nodes.description: You have a dragon!

nodes.name: Enlarged Glands
nodes.description: Your dragon can use its breath attack more often.

nodes.name: Fast Metabolism
nodes.description: Your dragon can recharges its breath weapon.

nodes.name: Draconic Catabolism
nodes.description: Can spend health to get breath weapon charges back.

nodes.name: Draconic Annabolism
nodes.description: Can spend breath attacks to regain health.

nodes.name: Burning Breath
nodes.description: Breath weapons cause a lasting negative effect on enemies.

nodes.name: Weakening Breath
nodes.description: Dragon fire weakens units.

nodes.name: Slowing Breath
nodes.description: Dragon fire slows enemy units.

nodes.name: Sundering Breath
nodes.description: Dragonfire reduces enemy armor.

nodes.name: Resistant Effect
nodes.description: Breath weapon effects are harder to remove.

nodes.name: Potent Dragonfire
nodes.description: Dragonfire does more damage.

nodes.name: Draconic Bombardment
nodes.description: Dragonfire does more damage.

nodes.name: Impassible Dragonfire
nodes.description: Units cannot walk through a hex hit by your draconic attack.

nodes.name: Skeleton
nodes.description: Congratulations, you have bones!

nodes.name: Musculature
nodes.description: Lets put some meat on them bones.

nodes.name: Zombie
nodes.description: Ugh, that looks infected.

nodes.name: Mount
nodes.description: You have an animal companion!

nodes.name: Dragon
nodes.description: You have a dragon!

nodes.name: Tough
nodes.description: You can take more damage.

nodes.name: Vitality
nodes.description: You can regain hp as an action.

nodes.name: Medic
nodes.description: You can heal adjacent units.

nodes.name: Recovery
nodes.description: Increase your healing potential.

nodes.name: Regeneration
nodes.description: Slowly gain HP.

nodes.name: Skeletal Realocation
nodes.description: Moving bones!

nodes.name: Potion Hoarder
nodes.description: Heal even better.

nodes.name: Harpoon
nodes.description: Tether a unit to yourself.

nodes.name: Bone Accumulation
nodes.description: Gain hp by bones.

nodes.name: Cursed Strikes
nodes.description: Attacks damage HP max.

nodes.name: Vampiric Strikes
nodes.description: Attacks heal you.

nodes.name: Strengthened Strikes
nodes.description: Increase base damage.

nodes.name: Vampiric Regeneration
nodes.description: No limit to regeneration.

nodes.name: Hamstringing Strike
nodes.description: Slow down opponents.

nodes.name: Rampaging Strikes
nodes.description: Can move 1 hex after each strike.

nodes.name: Sundering Arrowheads
nodes.description: Ranged attacks reduce enemy armor.

nodes.name: Poisoned Arrowheads
nodes.description: Ranged attacks do damage over time.

nodes.name: Whistling Arrowheads
nodes.description: Your arrows cause a high pitched whistling, both scaring and distracting units.

nodes.name: Draconic Quagmire
nodes.description: Your dragonfire creates a quagmire, nearly impossible to cross.

nodes.name: Increased flow rate
nodes.description: Draconic breath attack now hits multiple hexes.

nodes.name: Blasting Breathweapon
nodes.description: Breath attacks always do at least 1 damage.

nodes.name: Infecting Strikes
nodes.description: Units that you kill rise again as undead.

nodes.name: Lich
nodes.description: You are very hard to kill.

nodes.name: Multishot
nodes.description: Can shoot more.

nodes.name: Wooden
nodes.description: Congratulations! You are a ship.

nodes.name: Flaming Strikes
nodes.description: Attacks set enemies on fire.

nodes.name: Spreading Flame
nodes.description: Flame spreads more easily.

nodes.name: Stronger Flame
nodes.description: Flame debuff does more damage.

nodes.name: Sticky Quagmire
nodes.description: Quagmire slows units more.

nodes.name: Lingering Quagmire
nodes.description: Quagmire lasts longer.
